title: Check Video Ad for Compliance
description: A new ad creative from an advertiser needs to be checked against technical and content policies before it can be used in campaigns.

tasks.description: Ingest the new ad creative file.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully ingests the video file.

tasks.description: Run an automated scan to check for technical compliance (e.g., bitrate, format, audio levels).
tasks.expected_outcome: The scan passes with no technical issues.

tasks.description: Manually review the ad for compliance with content policies (e.g., no promotion of gambling or violence).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the ad and confirms it complies with all content policies.

tasks.description: Approve the ad creative and make it available for campaigns.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent marks the creative as 'approved' in the ad management system.
